entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is mentioned as the teacher who was supposed to teach the lesson. He is described as being ill and unable to teach.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the person who is taking over Professor Lupin's class. He is described as having a twisted smile and black eyes that glitter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the student who is late to class and is being reprimanded by Snape for not sitting down.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a student who quickly corrects Snape's statement about what they have covered in class so far.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as the house that Harry Potter belongs to. It is also mentioned as being penalized by Snape for Harry's behavior.

relationships.description: Snape penalizes Gryffindor house for Harry's behavior, taking away ten points from them.
Harry Potter defies Snape by not sitting down when told to do so.
